First, load all necessary packages.
```{r}
# library("dplyr")      # Load dplyr package

# library("purrr")      # Load purrr package
library("data.table") # Load data.table package for fread
```
Next, read the .csv files that meet the latest format for CitiBike rider data.
```{r}
CB_Data <- fread("CitiBike_data/202102-202204-citibike-trip-data.csv")
head(CB_Data)
```
Then, merge all dataframes into one unified dataframe.
```{r}
CB_data = rbind(CB_202102, CB_202103, CB_202104, CB_202105, CB_202106,
                    CB_202107, CB_202108, CB_202109, CB_202110, CB_202111,
                    CB_202112, CB_202201, CB_202202, CB_202203, CB_202204)


```
